creator: carnold@apache.org
text:
If the tests are run on a clean log4j source directory, there will be multiple unresolved class warnings 
mostly involving classes in the org.apache.log4j.lbel package.  tests/build.xml only requested that 
build.core and build.servletApi from the log4j project be build and did not include build.oro (which 
contains the lbel classes) or build.smtp.

creator: carnold@apache.org
text: Changes committed on r 366598.  Also fixes problem with Clover coverage generation.
